Sections.SectionText: Gah! I mean ... greetings, Zarcon. I didn't realize I was holding you.
I only just learned how to speak into your mind. It's easier now that you've assembled my three parts.
No,  you've done a terrible thing. Look around you. What do you see?
I see you. Also, my helmet.
... yes. But you also see dead planets. You caused this.
My life energy supported all of these ecosystems. You removed me and broke the chain.
At least I got rid of your shrinking problem.
We like shrinking on these planets. We got along fine shrinking before you came. Put me back.
Sure. Except there's an army of automated terraforming robots about five minutes away.
Now that the planets are stable, they want to move in. Like new neighbors.
New neighbors that want to kill me.
Telepathy allows me, for instance, to know that your ship has weapons.
That's exactly how I plan to use them.
